post:
MyRoot.PW offers Bare Metal Unmanaged Servers in central Europe
(Vienna/Austria). Delivery Time is currently around 24 hours.


==================>>Servers
	
* MR1:
	C3558 (4c,4t)
	32GB ECC RAM
	1x 120 GB NVME
	2x 4TB HDD (CMR)
	5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
	IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
	[~~=> 55 EURO per Month -~~ ORDER (10% Discount: LET-INIT ) => 50 Euro / month](http://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=1 "Order")	

* MR2: (Only 1 in Stock)
	C2758 (8c,8t)
	16GB ECC RAM
	4x 4TB HDD (CMR)
	5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
	IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
	[~~=> 70 EURO per Month -~~ ORDER (10% Discount: LET-INIT ) => 63 Euro / month](http://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=2 "Order")	

* MR3
	Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)
	32GB ECC RAM
	2x 4TB HDD (CMR), 7200 rpm
	5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
	IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible 
	[=> 70 EURO per Month - ORDER](http://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=3 "Order")	

* MR4
	Xeon D-1540(8c,16t)
	32GB ECC RAM
	2x 120GB SSD and 2x 1TB HDD
	5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
	IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
	[=> 70 EURO per Month - ORDER](http://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=4 "Order")	
	
		
* MR5: (Only 1 in Stock)
	C2550 (4c,4t)
	8GB ECC RAM
	4x 3TB HDD (CMR upgradabel to 4x4TB for +10 Euro/month)
	5TB Traffic on 100Mbit/s Port (1x IPv4)
	IPMI/HTML5 Console Avalible
	[=> 45 EURO per Month - ORDER](http://myroot.pw/user/index.php/order/config/index/servers/?group_id=1&pricing_id=6 "Order")	
	
==================>>Addon Pricing:
* General:
	+1x ipv4........+1.5 Euro/Month
